hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:There was argument between Adam and Moses, and Adam came the better of Moses. Moses said to him: You are the same Adam who misled people, and caused them to get out of Paradise. Adam said: You are the same (Moses) whom Allah endowed the knowledge of everything and selected him amongst the people as His Messenger. He said: Yes. Adam then again said: Even then you blame me for an affair which had been ordained for me before I was created

chapter.ara-name: باب حِجَاجِ آدَمَ وَمُوسَى عَلَيْهِمَا السَّلاَمُ
chapter.eng-name: The Debate Between Adam And Musa (Peace And Blessings Of Allah Be Upon Them)
